content: the eyes count 12sts around between row remember to stuff the body as you go 5 and 6 mark as the centre then count 5sts 09-11 24sc change to b 24 either s ide and 2 row in 12 24sc 24 13 single_crochet decrease single_crochet x6 18 14 decrease single_crochet x6 12 15 decrease x6 6 16 decrease single_crochet x2 4 break and pull through the yarn close the remaining stitches and weave in ends make sure the stinger right left continues to poke out and doesn t sink into the body make your design don t forget to unique by adding a squish the body to smile or eyebrows for hide any cut threads an expressive bee © 2019 bamboomint amy woodhouse all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only this pattern or parts of it may not be shared reproduced or sold this pattern or parts of it may not be altered translated distributed posted or published in any way over the internet or offline you may not sell items made from this pattern antennae start with yarn b make two i m using pink here to show more clearly where to crochet start a foundation chain of 9ch and begin crocheting into the back bump of the fifth chain from the hook 01 slip_stitch x5 8 break yarn with a long rest for sewing and pull through crochet into these next bumps 02 01 wings start with yarn c make two 01 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet 3tr double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in magic_ring 9 pull the magic_ring closed but not too tightly break the yarn with a long rest for sewing and pull through assembly sew the antennae between rounds 5 and 6 with a distance of 4 stitches next sew the wings between row 7 and 10 with a distance of 4 stitches add some pink yarn under the eyes to make blushing cheeks if you haven t already and add any extra details to make your bumblebee perfect to your taste and you re finished i hope you enjoyed this pattern make your little bee into a constant companion with a keyring try using ribbon to make him into a decoration too find more patterns products and information on the following platforms https //www etsy com/uk/shop/bamboomint https //www instagram com/bamboomint/ https //twitter com/bamboo_mint
